attributes.action: Explain why British news media are quiet on Chemtrails whilst there's a storm of protest in the USA?
attributes.additional_details: And explain why the Met Office bangs the phone down and tells me I am imagining it and there is no such thing as chemtrails. Contrails disappear, Chemtrails cover the sky. Explain how 'contrails' are switched on and off unless you wish to further insult our intelligence.

rejection.details: The petition seems to be a request for information.  The creator can raise an enquiry about matters falling under the DFT using the form found at https://www.dft.gov.uk/about/contact/form/
